title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

21:13 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
21:15 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: What's the policy on using the 2.1 syntax in the default XE xar?  
21:16 <vmassol> sdumitriu: hmmmm  
21:16 <vmassol> it might be too early for that, where would we need it?  
21:16 <vmassol> the only issue is that it's not final and subject to changes  
21:16 <@sdumitriu> login links  
21:17 <@sdumitriu> Replacing {{html}}with [[path:]]  
21:17 <vmassol> yes a good use case indeed  
21:17 <vmassol> i don't think we're going to change this part  
21:17 <vmassol> OTOH  
21:17 <vmassol> are users going to think that 2.1 can be used if we do that?  
21:18 <vmassol> maybe this needs a vote on the list  
21:18 <@sdumitriu> Well, not in 2.7  
21:18 <vmassol> yes not 2.7  
21:18 <vmassol> ok 3.0M1 should be ok probably  
21:18 <vmassol> well still  
21:18 <vmassol> we won't have finished 2.1 in 3.0M1 I think  
21:18 <vmassol> s/3.0M1/3.0/  
21:19 <vmassol> I don't know…. we need to ask others. I'd be ok on my side
